name: Meltdown Oil for Acne Prone Skin
about: What it is:An oil for blemish-prone skin that reduces the appearance of blemishes and targets future breakouts while keeping your skin hydrated, nourished, and visibly even toned..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Redness, and Acne and Blemishes.Formulation:Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:- Black Cumin Seed: A calming oil that visibly targets blemishes, reduces redness, and soothes irritation..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This visible blemish-fighting oil is formulated with a powerful blend of clean ingredients for clearer-looking skin. It fights blemishes with its antibacterial and calming properties, reduces the appearance of blemish scars, and targets future breakoutsu2014all while leaving your skin feeling hydrated and clear, never dry or oily..Clinical Results:In a Blume-conducted study of 30 participants:
ingredients: -Black Cumin Seed: This oil reduces the look of blemishes, redness, and soothes irritation..-Blue Tansy: Naturally fights blemishes while calming and soothing skin..-Rose Hip Oil: visibly fades scars and evens out skin tone while hydrating skin. ..Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil, Rosa Moschata (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Tanacetum Annuum Flower/Leaf/Stem Oil,Anthemis Nobilis (Roman Chamomile) Oil, Helichrysum Italicum Flower Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Bisabolol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Bala (Sida Cordifolia) Root Extract.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-One pump is all you need. .-Apply to targeted areas with clean fingers on face or body. .-For full-coverage blemish targeting, mix a pump of Meltdown into your daily moisturizer or clay mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The time between these pictures is just over a monthu2026(the two new spots are due to my cycle and the scars are being treated by the Faded serum from topicals [highly recommend])   Iu2019m so happy I got this oil and introduced it to my routine.  Full Disclosure: I use the whole SkinFix Barrier+ line and I will recommend them till the day I die, I have noticed a huge improvement overall. I started just before taking the first picture, and now Iu2019ve been using it for a while.  Iu2019ve used many spot treatments before, I used UFO by Sunday Riley and didnu2019t see anything change, I used the Cannabis oil from Kiehls and that was mehu2026but this?   THIS BABY?   I donu2019t post pictures usually but I had to for this one. Iu2019m turning 23 and Iu2019m a teacheru2026I donu2019t want to have acne like this when Iu2019m in front of teenagers, itu2019s brutal and I hate it. I know how difficult acne is and how itu2019s so detrimental to our confidence. So when I started using this product and noticed it made a difference? I had to share and hopefully help someone out.   I use this a few ways: a serum/oil as itu2019s own step, a spot treatment underneath/on top of moisturizer, and/or added in with my moisturizer (the barrier+ cream is really rich, so I only add the oil in it at night or if Iu2019m home all day cause Iu2019m a glazed doughnut.)  I sometimes do day and night, I just gauge how my skin is in the morning. If I want to use any pimple patches, I try and make sure I donu2019t have too much product on otherwise they wonu2019t stick.   Will this be for everyone? No. No single skincare product is for everyone. But try it. Give it a shot and see. I did that and in a month I had these results.

I did not experience problem with the pump, it works like any regular pump product out there so packaging is perfect from my opinion. I would really suggest using 1 pump only because I just feel like 2 pumps is a little too much product. I really enjoyed this oil and would be repurchasing in the future !

reviews.review_text: Love this product, on my 4th or 5th bottle now! Fights off my hormonal acne (especially if I apply to my trouble areas, when  I know that breakouts are coming). reviews.review_text: I love melt down! It has been my go to since March and it has proven to be a lifesaver for my hormonal breakouts. A little goes a long way. I usually use one pump and apply directly to spots, let it dry and then apply my moisturizer. My painful acne is soothed over night and visibly smaller. Plus its a good price for the amount of product you receive. I'm just finishing my first bottle now and I already ordered my second!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I noticed my acne diminishing and the inflammation in my skin reduce. It also made a difference on my redness! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It usually reduces and removes my pimples overnight and itu2019s great for blind pimples( painful pimples under the skin with no white head). All my blemishes are gone after five nights so definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_text: The Meltdown Oil for Acne-Prone Skin is a very versatile product. Due to it being a lightweight oil, it absorbs very nicely into my skin. Therefore I can use this oil in the morning and the evening. I use this oil as a base layer product to help prevent acne. This product does help to reduce inflammation, redness and the longevity of my acne. The natural scent is calming and not overbearing. I really appreciate the natural ingredients and the fact that this product is targeted towards acne and it does not dry out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it! Didnu2019t break out at all, woke up to my skin feeling really smooth and super hydrated. I am only using it at night because itu2019s an oil. Acne seems a lot less red in the morning. Love it!!!

reviews.review_text: I was looking for something to help with adult acne and hormonal outbreaks for a long time. I have tried it all so glad the search is over. Melted away all the spots on my forehead, just be sure to use daily. One missed application and the spots will try and make a comeback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! Use it on my face every day AND it healed an inflamed piercing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It's perfect to layer under moisturizer before bed giving my face a nice glow and minimizing any imperfections. Love the scent too, as it's not too harsh but still smells so clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with sensitive skin it is very hard for me to find acne treatments that don't irritate my skin. This is the first product I've used that does not excessively dry out my skin. I applied it directly to some problem areas I had and overnight the size was reduced! With continued use this product can improve the skin's texture over time. Of course there is a strong smell when first applying the product but that's just the natural ingredients at work and I really don't mind it.  This will definitely be a regular skincare routine item

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m 25, South Asian, and have dry skin. Iu2019ve had acne since I hit puberty, and with the exception of a few heavy-duty prescription years, Iu2019ve never had clear skin. For the past few years Ive had regular acne on my cheeks (the majority are not hormonal) as well as some scarring and discolouration.I started Meltdown a month ago and used it in combination with my moisturizer usually morning and evening, as a Blume advisor recommended. Iu2019m currently halfway through the (very teeny) bottle, about 1-2 months in, and am disappointed to say it hasnu2019t done anything noticeable for my skin. I wanted to try the product on my chest or butt acne but since the bottle is so tiny I felt I would run out really fast.  Not really sure what else there is to say other than these reviews gave me high expectations but it just didnu2019t work for me. Iu2019m going to keep going until it finishes but donu2019t really have any hopes. I guess one formula just cannot possibly work for all types of skin and acne *shrugs* On to trying the next trendy acne product and hoping Iu2019ll find something.  In terms of packaging, the pump is faulty. Blume did offer to send me a replacement pump but I ended up just transferring the product to an empty The Ordinary dropper bottle (and by the way, the product filled less than 1/3 of that bottle).

It's nice to have something in the market that caters to both dry and acne prone skin! Usually I find products for acne too drying but this left my skin feeling nice and hydrated! Still not too sure if it'll work on my acne but I think I have to use it for a few more days first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is really nice. I like the smell and keeps my skin nice ans hydrated. It did not magically get rid of any acne but I feel after some consistent use it did prevent new breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

Only giving it a 4 because the smell is a little strong but extremely worth it. So glad they are offering a bigger size bottle now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product. i have struggled with acne for years since about grade 8, everything from cystic to little whiteheads and blackheads. my skin has never been more clear since iu2019ve started using this! i use meltdown every morning mixed in with my moisturizer. it is an oil, however after applying my skin looks glowy and healthy, not oily. i have combination skin but more on the oily side, so this is a huge plus for me! i love how meltdown has changed my skin and the clean ingredients! i got the smaller size as an xmas gift and iu2019m almost out (1 pump every day for about 7 months). iu2019m ordering the larger size now. the price and quality of this are unbeatable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this feels on my skin and the scent is so invigorating.

I use 2-3 drops every night before bed, patting the oil on the biggest problem areas. Iu2019ve been using this product for over a month and havenu2019t had any bad reactions and I have extremely sensitive skin. I have noticed a reduction in big breakouts since using this. I recommended it to a friend and she said it made her acne disappear in a week! Overall will be keeping this product in my skincare line up.

reviews.review_text: I tried this product because of all the hype surrounding it and the claims of it clearing peopleu2019s skin in just a week. However, when i started using it I got small, red pimples on my forehead (I never break out on my forehead). I assumed the product was just purging my skin because of its cleaning properties, however upon further research it seemed to just be a break out. I stopped using the product for one day and saw my skin immediately feel less irritated. I really wanted to love this product but itu2019s not for me :( I recommend testing out this product for yourself because the results on some people are amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant because I see sponsored ads for this stuff all the time. I have combination skin, Iu2019m in my 40u2019s and donu2019t let your mom tell you that youu2019ll stop getting zits in your later years cause thatu2019s a bunch of malarkey. I get breakouts when I have my period and itu2019s so annoying. I bought this stuff cause Iu2019m sick of using drug store crap that bleaches my pillow cases. It works. It really does. I donu2019t get cystic acne at all, but I get breakouts nonetheless and using this stuff has been a real pleasure. Just a light swipe and go to bed and for some reason the witchcraft is working. It smells really strong and itu2019s not the best cause thereu2019s definitely some tea tree in there and that stuff is not light smelling. But whatever... my breakouts are gone and I couldnu2019t be happier. Just buy it. Trust me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for about a month. So far, I donu2019t think it has prevented my hormonal acne but I can say that it has definitely helped in reducing the severity and longevity of the acne I do get. I think Iu2019ll have to use it for longer to truly see if it works in preventing acne. I use this morning and night after cleansed and toner along with a moisturizer and it really does seem to help. The smell definitely takes some getting used tou2014kind of an oil of oregano/pizza kind of deal.  The real downside to this product is the truly terrible packaging. Does it look good? Yes. But itu2019s not a functional method for using this oil in the slightest.  Thereu2019s no way to do a gentle pump for less productu2014even the slightest push gives you the same amount of product (which is enough for my entire face, but sometimes Iu2019d rather a spot here and there). Beyond that, the oil is seeping out from the bottom of the pump leaving the whole bottle, and now my counter, an oily mess. Now my face and my entire bathroom smells like pizza haha. I would never take this travelling without transferring it to another container, can only imagine the mess it would make.   All in all, the oil works great, but I feel Iu2019m giving this product a generous four because of the awful bottle it comes in. Hoping that Blume will change this for something that is more effective in the future.

reviews.review_text: This is truly a holy grail acne product for me, and I've tried everything. reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for three weeks, and so far I have been impressed! I purchased after my skin went through a particularly rough patch of time. Usually I deal with redness, hormonal acne on my jawline, and clogged pores on my cheeks.   So far I have noticed that my skin looks much more glowy and hydrated. I apply one pump morning and night in addition to my Laneige water sleeping mask (spring/summer moisturizer). I have had one large/deep pimple on my jawline but the redness and pain subsided much more quickly than usual. I'm giving four stars because I want to give it a bit more time to see how well it handles hormonal acne in the next two weeks :) Also, the scent is definitely noticeable. I actually like it, but it's very strong and herbal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product highly recommend it to those who have any kind of acne issues!!!$

reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted this to work, it did not. I have used clean skincare products for years now due to allergies. This made my breakout like crazy, I used it for over three weeks to make sure it was not just an adjustment period. I even tried to use this on my chest where my sports bra leaves some blemishes due to sweat, it did not work there either and congested my skin further. In addition the smell of the product is so overpowering even with only one drop mixed in with your regular moisturizer. I gave it two stars only because I love the idea and company and that it is Canadian.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been struggling with hormonal acne for awhile and this Is one of first products thatu2019s gentle enough and works! Skin clarity improved within a week of daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have wild skin-- Rosacea redness and breakouts, prone to inflamed ingrown hair along the jawline, hormonal breakouts every month. I've used benzoyl peroxide as my overnight treatment for twenty-two years, even as I've moved into my forties and added retinol to my aging skin routine. After all the advertisements and reviews, I figured, hey, I'm working from home, if it goes wrong who is going to see me? My skin was especially bad, from the stress of recent days, but after one night of a couple drops in my regular moisturizer (in place of applying peroxide)... my bumps went down to almost nothing. Every morning I wake expecting to see a surprise, and each morning my skin looks better. It's healing. Redness is fading. My skin is soft and balanced and dark spots are disappearing. Ingrowns happen, but they don't explode, and without the inflammation, they're near enough the surface they can be extracted and grow naturally. It's been two weeks, maybe it will go wrong at some point, I'm just learning this routine, but so far, after having to centre my life around a difficult, sheet and hair bleaching, drying treatment... This smelly little oil is life changing. (I like the smell of tea tree, but I get it if you don't.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: unfortunately this one did not eliminate any of my hormonal acne.

Doesnu2019t work. Smells like black liquorice which is kind of gross. Marketing claims to u201ctake down pimples overnightu201d but everytime Iu2019ve used this oil on a spot Iu2019ve woken up with 2-3 more pimples erupted WHERE the oil was. Basically useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff actually works!  My skin is normally pretty good, except sometimes I will get big, red, angry cystic acne on my chin that take forever to go away and leave a mark even after they are gone.  Everything I've ever tried has not really worked except to dry out the area but the redness and discoloration will still be there.  The meltdown is the first thing I've ever used to really took the swelling down, the redness is gone, in only a few days!!!  And I noticed a big difference in just 1 night!  I'm used to it taking weeks or months to fully go away!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell and I liked that it didnu2019t make my skin dry, but it actually made me break out, in addition to not doing much for my existing acne. And I know it was this product because I broke out in the exact same areas I was applying it. It seems that everyone else loves Meltdown and seems to be okay with it, but just be warned that this is a possibility.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a good 3 weeks in order to give it a fair shot (and also because it received so many positive reviews). Unfortunately, my mild hormonal acne worsened in severity and in number of lesions. I also developed a skin reaction and was diagnosed with irritant contact dermatitis  where the product was applied. After discontinuing use of this product, my skin is finally recovering.  Overall, this product does not agree with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously Amazing, I have hormonal acne (in my 40s) and have tried all the major brands, blue light therapy, and dr prescribed cream, I still had the under the skin sore pimples. I have used this for 2 days and everything has dried up and my skin is glowing. It's like magic in a bottle.

reviews.review_title: Must get for severe acne breakouts!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've literally never wrote a review but this is definitely worth it! This is a holy grail miracle product. My skin was so bad and full of acne scars, large red painful pimples and whiteheads. Applying this religiously for 3 days brought all of that down! After trying harsh products like salicylic acid and benzol pyroxide, this product takes the cake! I only took off 1 star because I wish more product came with the bottle, it's a little overpriced for me. I had to use more than the 1-2 drops required to clear my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This work as magic. I have quiet few pimples at my chin area i tried so many products but nothing works. I bought this one and applied this two times at night time and after two days my chin got clear. I only apply on my problem areas and it work like magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been my holy grail since before Sephora sold it. I struggled with cystic acne after going off my birth control and NOTHING would take it down no matter what I tried. We are trying for a baby and it was so bad I contemplated giving up and just going back on the pill so I could clear my face. I am SO glad I found this product. After 2 weeks my face was completely cleared up. I still get the odd pimple here and there but itu2019s gone within a day or two using this. I also use the Drunk Elephant TLC serum which seems to be a powerhouse combo with this! And I started to use the OleHenriksen Dark Spot toner a week or so ago and each morning I wake up my scarring is better and better and itu2019s almost completely gone now. My skin finally is looking flawless again with these 3 products. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily acne prone skin. I had much success with other acne oils, and hoped I'd enjoy this one more. Sadly I found myself developing milia all over the face. When doing a test patch multiple milia showed up within 12 hours of using this oil. I tried it for 10 days thinking my skin was pruging itself, when in reality it was a reaction to this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad that I found this product! I have been using it for about a year now, and all I can say is YES! It is the perfect aid for all my acne problems at every stage.   I use Blumeu2019s Daydreamer cleanser and follow with Meltdown every. single. night. I have seen incredible improvements in my skin and I canu2019t say enough good things. At first, I was a little uneasy that it wouldnu2019t live up to the hype, because it seemed I was breaking out more than it was healing. But honestly, I think that was my skin cleansing itself and getting used to a safe and good product that was finally treating my acne properly without stripping it of oils and leaving it dry.   You honestly need a single drop from the dropper, not exaggerating. Too much and youu2019ll feel like a gross oily mess and it probably wonu2019t help your skin. I put the single drop on my finger and rub it over the problem areas of my face. Some nights, i will use two small drops and put it on my entire face. I also use this under my makeup for everyday wear if I notice iu2019m getting a spot or have a trouble area.   Iu2019m not joking when I say that your spots will clear up in 24 hours. I have noticed a spot in the morning, and by the time I am washing my face after the day, itu2019s completely gone. My original bottle lasted me like 6 months, and i even spilled some.  Highly, highly recommend anyone who struggles with acne to give this a try! Be patient and stick it out, I promise you my skin is so so so much better for using this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WAYYYY too over hyped.  It did literally nothing.  They are just amazing at marketing.  If you dont want to break the bank and have pure essential oils and carrier oils at home, research EO's that are good for your skin concerns and make your own little skin serum.  I get better results with that than with this.  I am so angry I wasted my $ on this mediocrity. It gets 1 star for having a scent that relaxes me after I get stressed thinking about how I spent $26 on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly amazing! After around 3 weeks of using this product, my existing acne and scarring has gone down tremendously. Even though I am still dealing with hormonal acne (especially around my chin) and the occasional whitehead, I just use 1-2 drops directly on any problem area and the redness/size reduces quite a lot.

Iu2019ve learned what works for some wonu2019t work for all, but for me this stuff so far is incredible.

I've recommended it to so many of my friends and they all love it as well! Thanks Blume.

reviews.review_text: I always have pre-period hormonal breakouts. I have tried so many high-end and drugstore products but this is the only thing that works.  It doesn't have any long name chemicals. It is simply blend oils but somehow it really works on my breakouts and calms the redness of my cheeks. I used it for a month and it really makes a difference.
